amendment.description: To require the Consumer Product Safety Commission to develop training standards for product safety inspectors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4103 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4103 proposed by Senator Cardin. (consideration: CR S1575-1576; text: CR S1575) To require the Consumer Product Safety Commission to develop training standards for product safety inspectors.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4103 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4103 proposed by Senator Cardin.
